name: CTGT
headline: Entirely New AI Stack: Efficient and Safe Alternative to LLM Ecosystem
description: CTGT is building the next evolution of AI, towards intelligence that is foundationally designed to be efficient and trustworthy. Our enterprise-grade platform prevents AI hallucinations and errors in real-time while maximizing ROI. Based on seminal research that opens the "black box" of AI, we enable Fortune 500 companies to deploy AI with confidence through automated risk prevention, comprehensive audit trails, and institutional-grade security controls. With AI adoption surging to 72%, we help organizations avoid costly mistakes and reputation damage while achieving 99.99% reliability and 10x faster deployment times. Trusted by industry leaders and backed by prominent investors, CTGT transforms AI from a liability into a competitive advantage.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:deep-learning; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Cyril Gorlla, Founder
founders.description: Cyril Gorlla is the recipient of the Endowed Chair's Fellowship at UCSD. His work on efficient AI training was invited for presentation at ICLR and his talk at Ai4 was the most attended in its track. He collaborated with Intel on ML telemetry deployed on 8M+ CPUs. He was named one of 12 “2022 Shining Stars” at UCSD and is an Ivory Bridges Fellow and Nordson Leadership Scholar. He was advised by ACM and Amazon Fellow Mikhail Belkin.

founders.name: Trevor Tuttle, Founder
founders.description: I was a deep learning researcher focused on high powered distributed ML systems under Hao Zhang, a student of Databricks Founder Ion Stoica, at UCSD. I left my studies to pursue this venture, CTGT, where I am the CTO.

# Enterprise AI Risk Management & Performance Platform
Trusted by Fortune 500 leaders to eliminate AI hallucination risk while maximizing ROI. Protect your organization from the mounting liability and reputational risks of AI deployment.
Book a meeting ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/671626215755ed13d2133c9d_Group%2010957.png)
[![Launch](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/M9e-ctgt-accelerate-ai-time-to-market/upvote_embed.svg/)](https://www.ctgt.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/M9e-ctgt-accelerate-ai-time-to-market>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/671956456927386580467608_Group%2011065.png)
## What They’re Saying About Us
CTGT's speedup in deploying AI applications in critical areas is impressive.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/6759ce4db513dc7f61550349_gonz.jpeg)
Gonzalo Maldonado
CTO, Mocksi, ex-Tech Lead, Nextdoor
It's CTGT's ability to open up the black box of deep learning that is particularly exciting—they are the only solution I have seen that can do this.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/671648f241441df35cff2078_Group%2011031-1.png)

CEO, EyePop, exit to Google
Zapier is the biggest automated AI platform in the world, and the #1 problem preventing businesses from adopting AI is low user trust. CTGT is developing a super novel approach that solves the unreliability and inherent limitations of modern AI to ensure that it's trustworthy for business needs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/671a86892005c97321912cb7_Group%2011031.png)
Mike Knoop
Co-founder and Head of AI, Zapier
## Don't Become the Next Headline
### Automated Risk Prevention
As AI adoption surges to 72% ([McKinsey](https://www.ctgt.ai/<https:/www.mckinsey.com/capabilities/quantumblack/our-insights/the-state-of-ai#/>)), executives face unprecedented liability risks from AI hallucinations and errors. CTGT's real-time monitoring automatically prevents AI failures before they impact your business, with comprehensive audit trails that protect your organization. Don't become the next headline - like countless others deploying AI have experienced.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/671e12be409351203fb29fed_Property%201%3DGroup%2011118.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/671e12beab2dd5e0a0a1fde2_Property%201%3DGroup%2011116.svg)

### Proven Enterprise Security
Deploy AI with confidence using our institutional-grade security framework, trusted by critical enterprises and leading financial institutions. With 54% of businesses citing AI as their highest technology risk ([Deloitte](https://www.ctgt.ai/<https:/www2.deloitte.com/us/en/pages/about-deloitte/articles/technology-trust-ethics-annual-report.html>)), CTGT provides the governance and compliance controls your board demands.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/67163cba9d734a9eaebeee15_Vector%2030.png)
Better customer retention
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/67163cba9d734a9eaebeee15_Vector%2030.png)
Increased user trust
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/67163cba9d734a9eaebeee15_Vector%2030.png)
Maximize AI ROI
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/6719552b4ef6513fe5fb68b4_Group%2010974.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/6719552b198a4ac5688ec79c_Group%2010972.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/6719552b7daa760abdabb3fb_Group%2010973.png)
### Accelerated Time to Value
While 65% of enterprises now use AI, only a fraction capture meaningful value (McKinsey). CTGT’s framework enables 10x faster model deployment, automated accuracy verification, and continuous performance optimization with full regulatory compliance.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/67163ec540310cb9447e3cbd_Frame%2012489.png)
## AI Performance You Can Measure
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/6716448c11deedf0b911a962_Group%2011036.png)

Reliability Rating
Cutting-edge research gives you proactive analysis you can rely on.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/6716448cb292e0afafcfad8f_Group%2011037.png)
### $50M+
Risk Prevention
Stop costly hallucinations, data leakage, and compliance violations with minimal latency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/6716448c9d734a9eaec6c63b_Group%2011038.png)
### 2 Weeks → 5 Minutes
Deployment Time Accelerated
Speed up deployment by reducing time from weeks to minutes.

[Read case![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/6717674c421922d20f419615_Group%2010990.png)](https://www.ctgt.ai/<#>)
Partner with Us for AI Excellence
# Ready to Transform AI From a Liability to an Advantage?
Our team is here to help you learn how CTGT can protect your organization while maximizing AI ROI.
[Contact Us](https://www.ctgt.ai/<#>)
AI acceleration + Interpretability
## 10x Smoother Customer Experience for Leading Vision Startup
A leading computer vision company uses off-the-shelf models to provide a low code platform to users. Due to the inefficiency of traditional AI, customers are often presented with long waits when creating a model. In addition, unexpected model behavior is hard to explain and resolve due to the "black box" nature of deep learning.
## CTGT’s solution
CTGT's platform integrates seamlessly with existing workflows and yields 10x faster performance with accuracy comparable to or better than standard models. Inherent interpretability means customers can access a simple UI overlay that shows why the model is behaving unexpectedly and how to fix the issue. This means customers don't have to contact support as often. 
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/67177bcd2c3255d5aca0db13_Frame%2012548.png)](https://www.ctgt.ai/<#>)
AI acceleration
## Deep Learning Performance, Where It Wasn't Possible Before
A leader in the heavily regulated financial space processes massive amounts of tabular data for credit scoring. They cannot use deep neural networks (DNNs) due to regulatory requirements. CTGT's state of the art performance on tabular data and interpretability allows them to mathematically guarantee what factors go into a decision and why, unlike DNNs. This enables them to achieve DNN-level or better performance with vastly faster training time while meeting regulatory requirements.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/67177bcd2c3255d5aca0db13_Frame%2012548.png)](https://www.ctgt.ai/<#>)
edge compute
## How a Fortune 10 company can deploy efficient on-device compute with CTGT
CTGT is working with a Fortune 10 company to enhance on-device AI capabilities. In settings with constrained compute, the inefficiencies of traditional AI make it challenging to provide a responsive and fluid user experience. By integrating CTGT's framework, the company is able to deploy models that are capable, yet efficient.
## Results
Facial analysis task
98%
reduction in model size, no accuracy loss
6ms
inference time on SM8550, others >15ms
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/67177bcd2c3255d5aca0db13_Frame%2012548.png)](https://www.ctgt.ai/<#>)
## Leading AI Experts
Leading CTGT's vision to make AI safer and more accessible for teams
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67160e0e6bd76875921fe9a7/671c04e13b91273c5d8cd364_Cyril.png)

CEO
Recipient of the Endowed Chair's Fellowship at UCSD. His work on efficient AI training was invited for presentation at ICLR and his talk at Ai4 was the most attended in its track. Cyril collaborated with Intel on ML telemetry deployed on 8M+ CPUs. He was named a UCSD "Shining Star" and is an Ivory Bridges Fellow and Nordson Leadership Scholar.

# Ready to Transform AI From a Liability to an Advantage?
Our team is here to help you learn how CTGT can protect your organization while maximizing AI ROI.
Contact Us⟨7⟩
AI acceleration + Interpretability
## 10x Smoother Customer Experience for Leading Vision Startup
A leading computer vision company uses off-the-shelf models to provide a low code platform to users. Due to the inefficiency of traditional AI, customers are often presented with long waits when creating a model. In addition, unexpected model behavior is hard to explain and resolve due to the "black box" nature of deep learning.
## CTGT’s solution
CTGT's platform integrates seamlessly with existing workflows and yields 10x faster performance with accuracy comparable to or better than standard models. Inherent interpretability means customers can access a simple UI overlay that shows why the model is behaving unexpectedly and how to fix the issue. This means customers don't have to contact support as often. 
![⟨8⟩](https://www.ctgt.ai/<#>)
AI acceleration
## Deep Learning Performance, Where It Wasn't Possible Before
A leader in the heavily regulated financial space processes massive amounts of tabular data for credit scoring. They cannot use deep neural networks (DNNs) due to regulatory requirements. CTGT's state of the art performance on tabular data and interpretability allows them to mathematically guarantee what factors go into a decision and why, unlike DNNs. This enables them to achieve DNN-level or better performance with vastly faster training time while meeting regulatory requirements.
![⟨8⟩](https://www.ctgt.ai/<#>)
edge compute
## How a Fortune 10 company can deploy efficient on-device compute with CTGT
CTGT is working with a Fortune 10 company to enhance on-device AI capabilities. In settings with constrained compute, the inefficiencies of traditional AI make it challenging to provide a responsive and fluid user experience. By integrating CTGT's framework, the company is able to deploy models that are capable, yet efficient.

generated_description:
**CTGT Overview**

CTGT is an emerging player in the artificial intelligence landscape, founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24. Nestled in San Francisco, this lean startup boasts a team of two, focused on building a cutting-edge AI platform that emphasizes efficiency and trustworthiness. 

**Mission and Vision**

The company's mission is to create an "entirely new AI stack" that serves as a safe, efficient alternative to the existing large language model (LLM) ecosystem. CTGT aims to empower Fortune 500 companies to deploy AI with greater confidence while preventing hallucinations and errors in real-time. The platform incorporates automated risk management and provides comprehensive audit trails, all backed by institutional-grade security controls. With AI adoption soaring, CTGT seeks to mitigate the costly mistakes and reputational damage associated with flawed AI implementations.

**Key Achievements and Recognition**

CTGT has quickly gained traction, attracting the attention of industry leaders and prominent investors. They report a remarkable achievement of 99.99% reliability in their AI deployments, as well as reducing model deployment times from weeks to mere minutes—asserting a tenfold increase in efficiency. 

**Services and Pricing**

CTGT’s platform facilitates automated risk prevention and enhanced AI governance, crucial as organizations grapple with the rising liability risks tied to AI usage. They offer tiered pricing models—starting at $10,000 per year for basic access, scaling up to advanced solutions that include comprehensive compliance features and multi-model evaluations.

**Testimonials and Impact**

Industry figures like Gonzalo Maldonado, CTO of Mocksi, and Mike Knoop, co-founder of Zapier, have lauded CTGT’s innovative approach, particularly its ability to unlock the opaque world of deep learning. This positions CTGT not just as a service provider, but as a trusted partner in navigating the complexities of AI.

**Conclusion**

In a world where AI's potential is matched only by its risks, CTGT stands out by offering a pathway to safer, more efficient AI utilization. Their work not only enhances operational capabilities but also converts AI from a liability into a significant competitive advantage for businesses ready to embrace their solutions. For more information, visit their website at [CTGT.ai](https://www.ctgt.ai/).
